trans-unit.source: Provides digital rights management services for encrypting and decrypting protected content.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller digital rights management services för att kryptera och dekryptera skyddat innehåll.

trans-unit.source: CryptoProvider is created as a result of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A> method when binding a rights managed <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> to a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: CryptoProvider har skapats på grund av <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A>metoden vid bindning en rättigheter som hanteras <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>i <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A>

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, CryptoProvider is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: Precis som med andra <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>typer, CryptoProvider kan endast användas i program med fullständigt förtroende.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>

trans-unit.source: Gets the cipher block size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar cipher blockstorlek, i byte.

trans-unit.source: The `clearText` and `cipherText` buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> must be n*BlockSize bytes in length, where 'n' is an integer greater than or equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: Den `clearText` och `cipherText` buffertar skickades till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>och <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>måste vara n * blockstorlek byte i längd, där n är ett heltal större än eller lika med 1.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A> is `false`, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> must be the same length as the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>är `false`, buffertar skickades till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>måste ha samma längd som skickades till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> buffertar</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A> is `true`, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> can be a different length from the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> (all buffer sizes must still always be a multiple of BlockSize bytes in length).
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>är `true`, buffertar skickades till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>kan vara en annan längd från buffertar som skickades till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>(alla buffertstorlek måste fortfarande alltid vara en multipel av blockstorlek byte i längd).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>

trans-unit.source: A BlockSize of 1 indicates that the cipher is a stream cipher; a BlockSize of 2 or greater indicates a block cipher.
trans-unit.target: En blockstorlek 1 anger att chiffret är en dataström chiffrering; en blockstorlek 2 eller högre anger blockchiffer.

trans-unit.source: The cipher block size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Cipher blockstorlek, i byte.

trans-unit.source: The default block size for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] is 8.
trans-unit.target: Standard-blockstorleken för [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] är 8.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection listing the rights that passed verification and that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en samling som visar en lista över de rättigheter som skickats verifiering och som har beviljats för användaren.

trans-unit.source: A collection enumerating the rights that passed verification and that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: En samling som räknar upp de rättigheter som överförts kontroll och som ges till användaren.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has rights to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om användaren har behörighet att dekryptera.

trans-unit.source: CanDecrypt returns **true** if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> bound to this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> grants the user read access rights such as View, Edit, Print, or Owner.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar CanDecrypt **true** om den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>bundna till den här <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>ger användaren läsbehörighet till exempel visa, redigera, Skriv ut eller ägare.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"></xref> grants the user rights to decrypt; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **SANT** om den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"> </xref> ger användaren behörighet att dekryptera; annars **FALSKT**.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has rights to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om användaren har behörighet för att kryptera.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A> returns **true** if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> bound to this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> grants the user write access rights such as Edit or Owner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A>Returnerar **SANT** om den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>bundna till den här <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>ger användaren åtkomst med skrivrättighet rättigheter som redigera eller ägare.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense></xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"></xref> grants the user rights to encrypt; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **SANT** om den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"> </xref> ger användaren behörighet att kryptera; annars **FALSKT**.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*> can accept buffers that are different block sizes in length.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om <> </> *> och <> </> *> kan acceptera buffertar som skiljer sig blockera storlekar längd.

trans-unit.source: The `clearText` and `cipherText` buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> must be n*<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes in length, where 'n' is an integer greater than or equal to 1. If CanMergeBlocks is **false**, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> must be the same length as the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>. If CanMergeBlocks is **true**, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> can be a different length from the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> (all buffer sizes must still always be a multiple of <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes in length).
trans-unit.target: Den `clearText` och `cipherText` buffertar skickades till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>och <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>måste vara n* <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> byte i längd, där n är ett heltal större än eller lika med 1.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> Om CanMergeBlocks * *FALSKT**, buffertar skickades till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>måste ha samma längd som skickades till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> buffertar</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> Om CanMergeBlocks * *SANT**, buffertar skickades till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>kan vara en annan längd från buffertar som skickades till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>(alla buffertstorlek fortfarande alltid måste vara en multipel av <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>byte i längd).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the buffer passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> can be a different length from the buffer passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*>; otherwise, **false** if the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*> must be the exact same length.
trans-unit.target: **SANT** om bufferten som skickades till <> </> *> kan vara en annan längd från bufferten som skickades till <> </> *>, annars **FALSKT** om buffertar skickades till <> </> *> och <> </> *> måste ha exakt samma längd.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] the default is **true**.
trans-unit.target: För [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] standardvärdet är **SANT**.

trans-unit.source: Decrypts cipher text to clear text.
trans-unit.target: Dekrypterar cipher text för att rensa text.

trans-unit.source: The cipher text to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Chiffertext att dekryptera.

trans-unit.source: The decrypted clear text of cryptoText.
trans-unit.target: Den dekrypterade klartext av cryptoText .

trans-unit.source: cipherText is null.
trans-unit.target: cipherTextär null.

trans-unit.source: Decryption right not granted.
trans-unit.target: Dekryptering höger inte beviljats.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Dispose performs <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Dispose utför <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa Dispose när du är klar med hjälp av <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Dispose lämnar den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>oanvändbar.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: När du anropar Dispose, måste du släppa alla referenser till den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>så skräpinsamlingen kan frigöra minne som den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>var upptar.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Rensa ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [implementera en metod för ta bort](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid anropet avyttra innan du släpper senaste referens till <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: De resurser som den använder frigörs annars inte förrän skräpinsamlingen anrop av <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>objektets `Finalize` metod.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Släpper de ohanterade resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"> </xref> och släpper du de hantera resurserna.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas av allmänheten `Dispose()`metod och <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metod.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`anropar den skyddade `Dispose(Boolean)` metod med den `disposing` parametern `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>anropar `Dispose` med `disposing` inställd på `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> references.
trans-unit.target: När den `disposing` parametern är true, den här metoden Frigör alla resurser som innehas av alla hanterade objekt som den här <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>referenser.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden startar den `Dispose()` metod för varje refererade till objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frisläpp både hanterade och ohanterade resurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att släppa endast resurser som inte hanteras.

trans-unit.source: Encrypts clear text to cipher text.
trans-unit.target: Krypterar klartext att cipher text.

trans-unit.source: The byte length of the `clearText` buffer should be a multiple of the cipher <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Längd i byte av `clearText` bufferten ska vara en multipel av chiffret <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The digital rights management system uses [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] block cipher.
trans-unit.target: ID för rights management-systemet använder [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] blockera cipher.

trans-unit.source: With [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-aes-md.md)], blocks are encrypted independently such that two blocks of identical clear text produce identical cipher text results.
trans-unit.target: Med [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-aes-md.md)], block krypteras oberoende så att två block med identiska klartext ger identiska cipher textresultat.

trans-unit.source: To minimize potential decryption threats from independent block encryption, applications should employ methods to modify content, such as compression, to avoid encrypting identical clear text blocks.
trans-unit.target: För att minimera potentiella dekryptering från oberoende block kryptering, bör program använda metoder för att ändra innehåll, till exempel komprimering för att undvika identiska klartext block krypteras.

trans-unit.source: The clear text content to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Klartext innehåll att kryptera.

trans-unit.source: Encrypted cipher text of the given clearText.
trans-unit.target: Krypterad chiffertext för den angivna clearText .

trans-unit.source: clearText is null.
trans-unit.target: clearTextär null.

trans-unit.source: Encryption is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: Kryptering är inte tillåtet.

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs internal cleanup before the instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Frigör resurser och utför interna Rensa innan instansen frigöras vid en skräpinsamling.

trans-unit.source: Finalize performs <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Slutför utför <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden åsidosätter <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Programkod bör inte anropa den här metoden. ett objekt `Finalize` metoden anropas automatiskt under skräpinsamling, såvida inte slutförande av skräpinsamlingen har inaktiverats av ett anrop till den <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Finalize-metoderna och destruktorer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Rensa ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), och [åsidosätter metoden Slutför](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
